review: this movie was depicted to be a children's movie which will teach them some nice things but once you start watching the movie all that happens in the movie are murders total(5) , and if that's not enough a soul comes down from heaven or whatever to drive the car and avenge his death himself by crushing his enemies under the wheels , burning them , drowning them and because of all this his son has to suffer and the son rebuilds that car his father built even better than him eventhough his father was an automobile engineer and he is just a pervert college student who keeps on looking at girl's thighs and waists.now such type of guys end up in the toilet but he hooks up with her just because its a bollywood film .no doubt this film lost double than its budget a total bogus film,plz dont watch it.
